Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: O living being! be aware, open your eyes with the crowing of the cock, be attentive after attending to your body needs, taste the elixir of love with the Lord. Without relishing the Naam Amrit of beloved Lord's name, one would feel repentant ultimately.
